Schedule Announcements

Embedding HTLCG into LCG with Phenominators Part 2

On March 8, 2018
Lead by Jordan Needle

Jordan Needle will continue to present his ongoing research of embedding the directional slashes of Hybrid Type-Logical Categorial Grammar into Linear Categorial Grammar with phenominators.

Coordination in Linear Categorial Grammar with Phenogrammatical Subtyping
